title: Technical Analysis
author: N/A
content:
See the top gainers, losers, invest and get updated what's happening in the crypto market

Discover the secret world of unlisted shares — analyse India's top pre-IPO companies and invest before they hit the markets

HPCL is walking its upper Bollinger band indicating a swift upmove

Reliance is showing strength on the back of bonus news

Axis Bank is expected to remain sideways within our range. An Iron Condor trade to capitalise on an expected sideways trend.

Bank Nifty is expected to remain sideways within our range. A Double Butterfly (Asymmetrical) trade to capitalise on high volatility

Infosys is a high-probability buy trade in the IT sector

Bharti Airtel shows a classic uptrend with well-defined higher highs and higher lows

Datamatics is racing after a tie-up with Microsoft announcement

Titagarh Rail has consolidated and is likely to move up after a  huge volume day

Tata Technologies breaks out is on huge increase in volumes and price momentum.

RSI has formed a range breakout in Bharat Wires and MACD has given a bullish crossover

HDFC Bank is expected to remain sideways within our range. An Iron Condor trade to capitalise on an expected sideways trend.

Reliance Industries is expected to remain sideways within our range. An Iron Condor trade to capitalise on an expected sideways trend

The price crosses above 20-day moving average and MACD moves into a buy mode.

A multi-confirmation breakout trade is seen in The Indian Hotels

Prestige is looking strong above its flag breakout

There is a possibility of a major uptrend unfolding in Deep Industries

State Bank of India is expected to remain sideways within our range. An Iron Condor trade to capitalise on an expected sideways trend.

Bullish continuation movement is expected as breakouts are seen in price and oscillators in Bharti Airtel

Gold Bees likely to go up on FED stance of rate cuts

Indian Hotels’ price action shows a break out of a Bollinger band squeeze set-up

RSI has formed a trendline breakout in Titan and MACD has formed a bullish crossover

Godrej CP is bucking the market and is on the path to its previous highs

Biocon crosses above the 50-day moving average, and MACD gives a buy signal

A multi-confirmation breakout trade is seen in Hindustan Petroleum

Alok Industries has completed its consolidation and ready to try its next upmove.
